Interface Renderable

public interface Renderable
Something that can be drawn by the Renderer. A Renderable provides its world-space coordinates and knows how to draw itself given a Graphics2D context.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method

    Draw this object at a pixel position on screen.

  • Method Details

    • getX

      double getX()
      Returns:
      World X coordinate of this object.

    • getY

      double getY()
      Returns:
      World Y coordinate of this object.

    • draw

      void draw(Graphics2D g, int screenX, int screenY, int pixelsPerUnit)
      Draw this object at a pixel position on screen.
      Parameters:
      g - The Graphics2D context.
      screenX - Pixel X position on screen (already camera-adjusted).
      screenY - Pixel Y position on screen (already camera-adjusted).
      pixelsPerUnit - How many pixels represent one world unit.
